sentence.Network_en: The technics of the vertical furnace and reverberatory furnace is introduced in this paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了竖炉-反射炉联合作业工艺.

sentence.Network_en: A kind of environmental protection fuel melting copper reverberatory furnace with spray nozzle is introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍一种环保型喷嘴燃油熔铜反射炉,利用炉盖式套管提升机构实现封闭式熔炼.

sentence.Network_en: It introduces the process of recovering Indium from Lead reverberatory dust with H 2 SO 4 leaching - P 204 extraction.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要文章介绍了用H2SO4浸出 - P204萃取法从铅浮渣反射炉烟灰中回收铟的生产流程.

list.abs: 生物学上来讲,短期记忆是神经连接的暂时性强化,生理上的结构是反响回路(reverberatory circuit),而通过巩固后、可变为长期记忆。类别[编辑]根据Tulving的多重记忆系统.
reverberatory furnace 反射炉reverberatory smelting 反射炉熔炼reversal load 应变载荷
reverberation-time meter 混响时间测量计reverberatory mirror 反射镜reverberometer 混响计
reverberatory furnace 反射炉reverberatory wavelet 混响子波reverberatory 反射炉；回响的
